select * from invoice_line l where exists(select 1 from invoice_line_dist d, invoice_line_expence e where l.id = d.invoice_line_id and d.id = e.invoice_dist_id and e.exp_expense_line_id = #{expExpenseLineId})
and exists(select 1 from invoice_head ih, invoice_type it where ih.id = l.invoice_head_id and ih.invoice_type_id = it.id and it.deduction_flag = #{deductionFlag} )

select * from invoice_line l where not exists(select 1 from invoice_line_dist d, invoice_line_expence e where l.id = d.invoice_line_id and d.id = e.invoice_dist_id and e.exp_expense_line_id is not null) and l.invoice_head_id = #{invoiceHeadId}
